div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1851 Charsadda (anc. Peucolaotis), en- virons, Gandhara, Pakistan, c. 1936 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 1 AV, 3 AR Menander?: 1 AV st. Strato I: 1 tetradr. Nicias: 1 tetradr. Hermaeus: 1 tetradr. Disposition: London 1; Cambridge 1 Whitehead, NC 1950, p. 217 Shortt, NC 1963, p. 14 The ltd. is doubtful according to Shortt
